00112 /**
00113  * @brief Load the probe set names from the restrict list file
00114  * @param const AffxString& - The signal summary file name
00115  * @param AffxArray<AffxString>& - The vector to load the string values into
00116  */
00117 void CNLog2RatioData::loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList(AffxArray<AffxString>& ar)
00118 {
00119     Verbose::out(1, "CNLog2RatioData::loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList");
00120     AffxString strProbeListFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("probeset-ids");
00121     if (strProbeListFileName != "") {
00122       TsvFile tsv;
00123       tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00124       std::string strProbeSetName;
00125       tsv.open(strProbeListFileName);
00126       tsv.bind(0,0, &strProbeSetName,  affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00127       while( tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00128         ar.add(new AffxString(strProbeSetName));
00129       }
00130       tsv.clear();
00131       ar.quickSort(0);
00132     }
00133 }

00135 /**
00136  * @brief Load the model file and set up the Probe Set array with the pre-calculated median values from the log2 ratio model.
00137  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
00138  * @return bool - true if successful
00139  */
00140 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadModelFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00141 {
00142     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Loading Copy Number Reference File.");
00143     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::loadModelFile");
00144     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00145     bool bSuccessful = false;
00146     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00147     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00148     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00149     {
00150         try
00151         {
00152             AffxString str;
00153             double d = 0;
00154             affx::File5_File file5;
00155             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00156             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00157             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00158             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00159             {
00160                 AffxString str;
00161                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
00162                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
00163                 if (str.startsWith("#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-cel-file-"))
00164                 {
00165                     int iFindIndex = str.indexOf("=");
00166                     AffxString strPrompt = str.substring(2, iFindIndex);
00167                     AffxString strValue = str.substring(iFindIndex + 1);
00168                     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrompt));
00169                     param.SetValueAscii(Fs::basename(strValue));
00170                     CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->push_back(param);
00171                 }
00172                 else if (str.startsWith(CovariateParams::m_CNReferencePrefix))
00173                 {
00174                     CovariateParams::restoreCovariateParams(str);
00175                     if (str.find("signal-command") != std::string::npos)
00176                     {
00177                         m_pEngine->setOpt("signal-adjustment-covariates", CovariateParams::m_signalCommand);
00178                     }
00179                     else if (str.find("log2ratio-command") != std::string::npos)
00180                     {
00181                         m_pEngine->setOpt("lr-adjustment-covariates", CovariateParams::m_LRCommand);
00182                     }
00183                     else if (str.find("allele-peaks-command") != std::string::npos)
00184                     {
00185                         m_pEngine->setOpt("allele-peaks-adjustment-covariates", CovariateParams::m_APCommand);
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188             }
00189             tsv5->close();
00190             delete tsv5;
00191 
00192             bool useCovariateTsv = m_pEngine->getEngineName() == "CNCytoEngine"  &&
00193                                    group5->name_exists("Covariates");
00194             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Reference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00195             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5_C = NULL;
00196             int numCovariates;
00197             if (useCovariateTsv)
00198             {
00199                 tsv5_C = group5->openTsv("Covariates", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00200                 numCovariates = tsv5_C->getColumnCount(0);
00201             }
00202             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00203             {
00204                 AffxString strProbeSetName;
00205                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
00206                 objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00207                 iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00208                 if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00209                 {
00210                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00211                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->setMedianSignal((float)d);
00212                     tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); p->setXXMedianSignal((float)d);
00213                     tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->setYMedianSignal((float)d);
00214                     tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); p->setAAMedianSignal((float)d);
00215                     tsv5->get(0, 5, &d); p->setABMedianSignal((float)d);
00216                     tsv5->get(0, 6, &d); p->setBBMedianSignal((float)d);
00217                     if (useCovariateTsv)
00218                     {
00219                         if (tsv5_C->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00220                         {
00221                             for (int i = 0; i < numCovariates; i++)
00222                             {
00223                                 tsv5_C->get(0, i, &d);
00224                                 p->setCovariateValue(i, (float)d);
00225                             }
00226                         }
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229             }
00230             tsv5->close();
00231             delete tsv5;
00232             if (useCovariateTsv)
00233             {
00234                 tsv5_C->close();
00235                 delete tsv5_C;
00236             }
00237 
00238             group5->close();
00239             delete group5;
00240             file5.close();
00241             bSuccessful = true;
00242         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00243     }
00244     else
00245     {
00246         unsigned int uiRowCount = affx::TsvFile::getLineCountInFile(strFileName);
00247         if (uiRowCount > 1)
00248         {
00249             uiRowCount--;
00250             affx::TsvFile tsv;
00251             AffxString key;
00252             AffxString value;
00253             tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00254             if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00255               for ( tsv.headersBegin(); tsv.headersNext(key,value) == affx::TSV_OK; ) {
00256                 ///@todo AW: should this be "state" not "option"? Do we need to handle both for compatability reasons?
00257                 if (key.startsWith("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-cel-file-") ){
00258                   param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(key));
00259                   param.SetValueAscii(Fs::basename(value));
00260                   CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->push_back(param);
00261                 }
00262               }
00263               const std::string arModelHeaders[] = {
00264                 "probeset_id", "mediansignal","xxmediansignal","ymediansignal",
00265                 "aamediansignal",    "abmediansignal", "bbmediansignal",                
00266               };
00267               int iModelHeadersCount = (sizeof( arModelHeaders ) / sizeof(arModelHeaders[0] ) );
00268               bool okColumns = false;
00269               if ( tsv.getColumnCount(0) == iModelHeadersCount) {
00270                 AffxString cname;
00271                 okColumns = true;
00272                 for ( int cidx = 0; okColumns && (cidx < iModelHeadersCount) &&
00273                         (okColumns = (tsv.cidx2cname(0,cidx, cname) == affx::TSV_OK)); cidx++ ) {
00274                   if ( cname.toLowerCase() != arModelHeaders[cidx] ) {
00275                     okColumns = false;
00276                   }
00277                 }
00278               } 
00279               if ( !okColumns ) {
00280                 throw(Except("The file specified does not appear to be a model file: " + strFileName));
00281               }
00282               else {
00283                 bSuccessful = true;
00284                 int iDotCount = 10;
00285                 Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Model file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
00286                 std::string col;
00287                 while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00288                   Verbose::progressStep(1);
00289                   int cidx = 0;
00290                   std::string col;
00291                   AffxString strProbeSetName;
00292                   tsv.get(0,cidx++, strProbeSetName);
00293                   objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00294                   iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00295                   if (iSearchIndex != -1) {
00296                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00297                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00298                     p->setMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00299                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00300                     p->setXXMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00301                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00302                     p->setYMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00303                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00304                     p->setAAMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00305                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00306                     p->setABMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00307                     tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00308                     p->setBBMedianSignal((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
00309                   }
00310                 }
00311                 Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00312               }
00313               tsv.clear();
00314             } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00315         } else {throw(Except("Model file contains no data: " + strFileName));}
00316     }
00317     return bSuccessful;
00318 }

00320 /**
00321  * @brief Load the model file and set up the Probe Set array with the pre-calculated median values from the log2 ratio model.
00322  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
00323  * @return bool - true if successful
00324  */
00325 void CNLog2RatioData::loadCyto2ModelFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00326 {
00327     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::loadCyto2ModelFile");
00328     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00329     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00330     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00331     {
00332         try
00333         {
00334             double d = 0;
00335             affx::File5_File file5;
00336             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00337             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00338             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("MedianSignals", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00339             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00340             {
00341                 AffxString strProbeSetName;
00342                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
00343                 objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00344                 iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00345                 if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00346                 {
00347                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00348                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->setMedianSignal((float)d);
00349                     tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); p->setXXMedianSignal((float)d);
00350                     tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->setYMedianSignal((float)d);
00351                     tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); p->setAAMedianSignal((float)d);
00352                     tsv5->get(0, 5, &d); p->setABMedianSignal((float)d);
00353                     tsv5->get(0, 6, &d); p->setBBMedianSignal((float)d);
00354                 }
00355             }
00356             tsv5->close();
00357             delete tsv5;
00358             group5->close();
00359             delete group5;
00360             file5.close();
00361         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00362     } else {throw(Except("Reference file is not in HDF5 format: " + strFileName));}
00363 }

00365 /**
00366  * @brief Load the SNP reference file and set up the Probe Set array with the pre-calculated median values from the log2 ratio model.
00367  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
00368  * @return bool - true if successful
00369  */
00370 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadSnpReferenceFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00371 {
00372 
00373     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::loadSnpReferenceFile");
00374     bool bSuccessful = false;
00375     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00376     int iSearchIndex = -1;
00377     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00378     {
00379         try
00380         {
00381             AffxString str;
00382             double d = 0;
00383             int iInputInteger=0;
00384             affx::File5_File file5;
00385             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00386             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00387             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00388             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00389             {
00390                 AffxString strProbeSetName;
00391                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
00392                 objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00393                 iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00394                 if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00395                 {
00396                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00397                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->setMuAB((float)d);
00398                     tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); p->setMuAA((float)d);
00399                     tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->setMuBB((float)d);
00400                     tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); p->setInformation((float)d);
00401                     tsv5->get(0, 5, &iInputInteger); p->setUseInEMAlgorithm(iInputInteger);
00402                 }
00403             }
00404             tsv5->close();
00405             delete tsv5;
00406 
00407             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDValues", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00408             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00409             {
00410                 AffxString strProbeSetName;
00411                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
00412                 objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
00413                 iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
00414                 if (iSearchIndex != -1)
00415                 {
00416                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
00417                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->setFLD((float)d);
00418                     p->setValidFLDExists(true);
00419                 }
00420             }
00421             tsv5->close();
00422             delete tsv5;
00423 
00424             group5->close();
00425             delete group5;
00426             file5.close();
00427             bSuccessful = true;
00428         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00429     }
00430     return bSuccessful;
00431 }

00433 /**
00434  * @brief Load the allele summary table file and set up the experiment array with experiment name.
00435  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
00436  * @return int - The number of experiments loaded
00437  */
00438 int CNLog2RatioData::loadExperiments(const AffxString& strFileName)
00439 {
00440     getExperiments()->deleteAll();
00441     unsigned int uiColCount = 0;
00442     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00443     {
00444         try
00445         {
00446             AffxString str;
00447             affx::File5_File file5;
00448             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00449             affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00450             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00451             AffxString strAnalysisName = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00452             if (strFileName == m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))
00453             {
00454                 group5 = file5.openGroup(strAnalysisName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00455                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".plier.summary", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00456             }
00457             else
00458             {
00459                 tsv5 = file5.openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".plier.summary", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00460             }
00461             uiColCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0);
00462             for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 1; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)
00463             {
00464                 CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = new CNExperiment;
00465                 tsv5->getColumnName(0, uiColIndex, &str);
00466                 pobjExperiment->setIndex(uiColIndex - 1);
00467                 pobjExperiment->setExperimentName(str);
00468                 getExperiments()->add(pobjExperiment);
00469             }
00470             tsv5->close();
00471             delete tsv5;
00472             if (group5 != NULL)
00473             {
00474                 group5->close();
00475                 delete group5;
00476             }
00477             file5.close();
00478             uiColCount--;
00479         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00480     }
00481     else
00482     {
00483       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00484       tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00485       if (tsv.openTable(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00486         std::string col;
00487         std::string columnHeader("probeset_id");
00488         while ( (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
00489                 (tsv.get(0,0,col) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
00490                 ( col != columnHeader) ) { }
00491                 
00492         if ( col == columnHeader ){
00493           uiColCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
00494           int cidx = 1;
00495           for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++) {
00496             CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = new CNExperiment;
00497             pobjExperiment->setIndex(uiColIndex);
00498             tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
00499             pobjExperiment->setExperimentName(col);
00500             getExperiments()->add(pobjExperiment);
00501           }
00502         }
00503         tsv.clear();
00504       } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00505     }
00506     return uiColCount;
00507 }

00510 /**
00511  * @brief Load externally computed experiment genders.
00512  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load from
00513  */
00514 
00515 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadGenderOverrideFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00516 {
00517         //std::vector< std::pair< std:string, std::string> > vGenders;
00518         std::vector< pair<string,string>  > vGenders;
00519         std::pair<std::string, std::string> genderCall;
00520         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00521         tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00522         if(tsv.open(strFileName) != affx::TSV_OK)
00523                 Err::errAbort("Unable to open gender-override-file: "  + m_pEngine->getOpt("gender-override-file"));
00524 
00525 
00526         // We first load the gender information in to a vector from the gender-override-file.
00527         while(tsv.nextLevel(0)==TSV_OK){
00528         string inputString1;
00529         string inputString2;
00530 
00531                 if(tsv.get(0,"experiment",inputString1)==TSV_OK)
00532                 {
00533                         if(tsv.get(0,"gender",inputString2)==TSV_OK)
00534                         {
00535 
00536                                std::pair<string,string> pairGender(inputString1, inputString2);
00537                                vGenders.push_back(pairGender);
00538                         } else
00539                         {
00540                                 Err::errAbort("Unable to parse gender-override-file: missing column: gender.");
00541                         }
00542 
00543                 } else
00544                 {
00545                         Err::errAbort("Unable to parse gender-override-file: missing column: gender.");
00546                 }
00547 
00548         }
00549         //  Now iterate over the experiments that have been loaded and see if we have gender information from the gender-override-file.
00550         //  If not we issue a warning that no information has been found.
00551         int iExperimentCount = getExperiments()->getCount();
00552         for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < iExperimentCount); iExperimentIndex++)
00553         {
00554                CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00555                AffxString strExperimentName = pobjExperiment->getExperimentName();
00556 
00557                vector< pair <string, string> >::iterator beginIter= vGenders.begin();
00558                vector< pair <string, string> >::iterator endIter= vGenders.end();
00559                bool foundFlag=false;
00560                for( ; beginIter!=endIter; beginIter++)
00561                {
00562                        if(strExperimentName == (*beginIter).first)
00563                        {
00564                                if((*beginIter).second == "M")
00565                                {
00566                                    pobjExperiment->setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::Male);
00567                                    Verbose::out(1, "CNLog2RatioData::loadGenderOverrideFile(...)\t" + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + "\t" + ((pobjExperiment->getRawIntensityRatioGender() == "male") ? "XY" : "XX"));
00568 
00569                                }
00570                                if((*beginIter).second == "F")
00571                                {
00572                                        pobjExperiment->setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::Female);
00573                                        Verbose::out(1, "CNLog2RatioData::loadGenderOverrideFile(...)\t" + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + "\t" + ((pobjExperiment->getRawIntensityRatioGender() == "male") ? "XY" : "XX"));
00574                                }
00575                                if((*beginIter).second != "M" && (*beginIter).second !="F")
00576                                {
00577                                        Err::errAbort("Invalid gender found in gender-override-file for sample: " + strExperimentName);
00578                                }
00579                                foundFlag=true;
00580                         }
00581                }
00582 
00583                if(!foundFlag)
00584                {
00585 
00586                        Err::errAbort("No gender information found in gender-override-file for sample: " + strExperimentName);
00587                }
00588 
00589 
00590         }
00591 
00592         return true;
00593 }
00594 
00595 
00596 /**
00597  * @brief Load the QC metrics from the report file
00598  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load from
00599  */
00600 void CNLog2RatioData::loadQCMetrics(const AffxString& strFileName)
00601 {
00602     if (strFileName == "") {return;}
00603     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00604     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00605     
00606     if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00607       std::string strColumnName;
00608       for (int iColumn = 1; (iColumn < tsv.getColumnCount(0)); iColumn++){
00609         strColumnName = tsv.getColumnName(0, iColumn);
00610         CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->add(new AffxString(strColumnName));
00611       }
00612       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK)  {
00613         int cidx = 0;
00614         AffxString strExperimentName;
00615         std::string strColumnValue;
00616         tsv.get(0,cidx++, strExperimentName );
00617         for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++)  {
00618           CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00619           if (Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName()) == Fs::basename(strExperimentName))  {
00620             for (; cidx < tsv.getColumnCount(0); cidx++) {
00621               tsv.get(0,cidx, strColumnValue);
00622               pobjExperiment->getQCMetricColumnValues()->add(new AffxString(strColumnValue));
00623             }
00624           }
00625         }
00626       }
00627       tsv.clear();
00628     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00629 }
00630 
00631 /**
00632  * @brief Load the QC metric from the genotype report file
00633  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load from
00634  */
00635 void CNLog2RatioData::loadGenotypeReport(const AffxString& strFileName)
00636 {
00637     if (strFileName == "") {throw(Except("Genotype report file not specied."));}
00638     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00639     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00640     
00641     if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK)  {
00642       int iColumnNumber = 0;
00643       int ret = tsv.cname2cidx(0,std::string("computed_gender"));
00644       
00645       if ( ret > TSV_OK ) {
00646         iColumnNumber = ret;
00647       }
00648       else {
00649         throw(Except("Genotype report file must contain the computed_gender column."));
00650       }
00651       int iMaleCount = 0;
00652       int iFemaleCount = 0;
00653       int iUnknownCount = 0;
00654       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK){
00655         int cidx = 0;
00656         std::string col;
00657         tsv.get(0, cidx++, col);
00658         AffxString strExperimentName = col;
00659         for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++) {
00660           CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00661           AffxString str1 = Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName());
00662           str1 = str1.toLowerCase();
00663           AffxString str2 = Fs::basename(strExperimentName);
00664           str2 = str2.toLowerCase();
00665           if (str1 == str2) {
00666             AffxString strColumnValue;
00667             tsv.get(0,iColumnNumber, strColumnValue);
00668             pobjExperiment->setRawIntensityRatioGenderFromString(strColumnValue);
00669             strColumnValue = strColumnValue.toLowerCase();
00670             if (strColumnValue == "male") 
00671             {
00672                 pobjExperiment->setY(true); 
00673                 pobjExperiment->setCNCallGenderFromString("male"); 
00674                 iMaleCount++;
00675                 }
00676             else if (strColumnValue == "female") 
00677             {
00678                 pobjExperiment->setXX(true); 
00679                 pobjExperiment->setCNCallGenderFromString("female"); 
00680                 iFemaleCount++;
00681             }
00682             else  {
00683               Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Cannot determine sex for experiment: " + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName());
00684               iUnknownCount++;
00685             }
00686           }
00687         }
00688       }
00689       tsv.clear();
00690       if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("create-reference")) {
00691         Verbose::out(1, "Copynumber Reference contains " + ::getInt(iFemaleCount) + " female, " + ::getInt(iMaleCount) + " male, and " + ::getInt(iUnknownCount) + " unknown genders.");
00692       }
00693     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00694 }
00695 
00696 /**
00697  * @brief Dump the QC metrics into the copynumber report file
00698  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to dump to
00699  */
00700 void CNLog2RatioData::dumpGenotypeReport(const AffxString& strFileName)
00701 {
00702   AffxString strOutputFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00703                                           m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".CopyNumber.Report.txt");
00704   affx::TsvFile tsvOut;
00705 
00706   if (strFileName != "")  {
00707     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00708     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00709       
00710     if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00711       tsvOut.addHeader("version-to-report", m_pEngine->getOpt("version-to-report"));
00712       TsvFileHeaderLine * tsvHeader = NULL;
00713       for ( tsv.headersBegin(); (tsvHeader = tsv.nextHeaderPtr()) != NULL; ) {
00714         if ( tsvHeader->m_key.empty() ) {
00715           tsvOut.addHeaderComment(tsvHeader->m_value);
00716         }
00717         else {
00718           if ( tsvHeader->m_key == "guid") {
00719             tsvOut.addHeader("guid" , affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00720           }
00721           else {
00722             tsvOut.addHeader(tsvHeader->m_key,tsvHeader->m_value);
00723           }
00724         }
00725       }
00726       const std::string additionalHeaders[] = {
00727         "CN2Gender-ChrX-mean", "CN2Gender-ChrY-mean",
00728         "CN2Gender", "MedianAutosomeMedian",
00729         "MAPD", "iqr", "all_probeset_rle_mean",
00730         "gc-correction-size", "sample-median-cn-state",
00731         "sample-hom-frequency", "sample-het-frequency",
00732         "median-raw-intensity", "SNPQC", "RawSNPQC", "XX",
00733         "Y", "AntigenomicRatio", "waviness-seg-count" , "waviness-sd"
00734       };
00735       int additionalHeadersCount = sizeof( additionalHeaders) / sizeof(additionalHeaders[0]);
00736       std::string cname;
00737       int cidx = 0;
00738       for (; cidx < tsv.getColumnCount(0); cidx++ ) {
00739         tsv.cidx2cname( 0, cidx, cname );
00740         tsvOut.defineColumn(0, cidx, cname);
00741       }
00742       int totalColumns = tsv.getColumnCount(0) + additionalHeadersCount;
00743       for ( ;cidx < totalColumns; cidx++ ) {
00744         cname = additionalHeaders[cidx - tsv.getColumnCount(0)];
00745         tsvOut.defineColumn(0, cidx, cname);
00746       }
00747       tsvOut.writeTsv_v1(strOutputFileName);
00748         
00749       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00750         std::string col;
00751         for ( cidx = 0; cidx < tsv.getColumnCount(0); cidx++ ) {
00752           tsv.get(0,cidx, col);
00753           tsvOut.set(0,cidx, col);
00754         }
00755 
00756         tsv.get(0,0,col);
00757         AffxString strExperimentName = col;
00758         for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++) {
00759           CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00760           AffxString str1 = Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName());
00761           str1 = str1.toLowerCase();
00762           AffxString str2 = Fs::basename(strExperimentName);
00763           str2 = str2.toLowerCase();
00764           if (str1 == str2) {
00765             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getChrXMean(), 6));
00766             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getChrYMean(), 6));
00767             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00768             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian(), 6));
00769             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN(), 6));
00770             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getIqr(), 6));
00771             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle(), 6));
00772             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric(), 6));
00773             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianCnState(), 6));
00774             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getHomFrequency(), 6));
00775             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getHetFrequency(), 6));
00776             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianRawIntensity(), 6));
00777             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getSNPQC(), 6));
00778             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getRawSNPQC(), 6));
00779             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->hasXX() ? 1 : 0));
00780             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->hasY() ? 1 : 0));
00781             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getAntigenomicRatio(), 6));
00782             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSegCountTotal()));
00783             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSd(), 6));
00784           }
00785         }
00786         tsvOut.writeLevel(0);
00787       }
00788       tsv.clear();
00789       tsvOut.close();
00790       tsvOut.clear();
00791     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00792   }
00793   else {
00794     tsvOut.addHeader("version-to-report" , m_pEngine->getOpt("version-to-report"));
00795     tsvOut.addHeader("guid" , affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00796     const std::string headers[] = {
00797       "cel_files","CN2Gender-ChrX-mean","CN2Gender-ChrY-mean",
00798       "CN2Gender","MedianAutosomeMedian","MAPD","iqr",
00799       "all_probeset_rle_mean","gc-correction-size",
00800       "sample-median-cn-state","sample-hom-frequency",
00801       "sample-het-frequency","median-raw-intensity","SNPQC",
00802       "RawSNPQC","XX","Y","AntigenomicRatio","waviness-seg-count",
00803       "waviness-sd",
00804     };
00805     int headerCount = sizeof(headers) / sizeof(headers[0]);
00806     for ( int i = 0; i < headerCount; i++ ) {
00807       tsvOut.defineColumn(0,i,headers[i]);
00808     }
00809     tsvOut.writeTsv_v1(strOutputFileName);
00810     
00811     for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++){
00812       int cidx =0;
00813       CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00814       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++, Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName()));
00815       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getChrXMean(), 6));
00816       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getChrYMean(), 6));
00817       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00818       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian(), 6));
00819       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN(), 6));
00820       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getIqr(), 6));
00821       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle(), 6));
00822       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric(), 6));
00823       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianCnState(), 6));
00824       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getHomFrequency(), 6));
00825       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getHetFrequency(), 6));
00826       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianRawIntensity(), 6));
00827       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getSNPQC(), 6));
00828       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getRawSNPQC(), 6));
00829       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->hasXX() ? 1 : 0));
00830       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->hasY() ? 1 : 0));
00831       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getAntigenomicRatio(), 6));
00832       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSegCountTotal()));
00833       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSd(), 6));
00834       tsvOut.writeLevel(0);
00835     }
00836     tsvOut.close();
00837     tsvOut.clear();
00838   }
00839 }

00841 /**
00842  * @brief Dump the QC metrics into the copynumber report file
00843  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to dump to
00844  */
00845 void CNLog2RatioData::dumpCyto2Report(const AffxString& strFileName)
00846 {
00847   wstring wDateTime = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString();
00848   AffxString dateTime = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(wDateTime);
00849   dateTime.replace(':', '-');
00850   AffxString strOutputFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00851                                           dateTime + "." + m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".CopyNumber.Report.txt");
00852   affx::TsvFile tsvOut;
00853   if (strFileName != "")  {
00854     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00855     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00856       
00857     if (tsv.open(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00858       tsvOut.addHeader("version-to-report", m_pEngine->getOpt("version-to-report"));
00859       TsvFileHeaderLine * tsvHeader = NULL;
00860       for ( tsv.headersBegin(); (tsvHeader = tsv.nextHeaderPtr()) != NULL; ) {
00861         if ( tsvHeader->m_key.empty() ) {
00862           tsvOut.addHeaderComment(tsvHeader->m_value);
00863         }
00864         else {
00865           if ( tsvHeader->m_key == "guid") {
00866             tsvOut.addHeader("guid" , affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00867           }
00868           else {
00869             tsvOut.addHeader(tsvHeader->m_key,tsvHeader->m_value);
00870           }
00871         }
00872       }
00873       const std::string additionalHeaders[] = {
00874         "Y-Gender" , "MedianAutosomeMedian" , "MAPD" , "iqr" ,
00875         "all_probeset_rle_mean" , "gc-correction-size" ,
00876         "sample-median-cn-state" , "median-raw-intensity" ,
00877         "call-rate", "SNPQC" , "RawSNPQC" , "AntigenomicRatio" ,
00878         "waviness-seg-count" , "waviness-sd"
00879       };
00880       int additionalHeadersCount = sizeof( additionalHeaders) / sizeof(additionalHeaders[0]);
00881       std::string cname;
00882       int cidx = 0;
00883       for (; cidx < tsv.getColumnCount(0); cidx++ ) {
00884         tsv.cidx2cname( 0, cidx, cname );
00885         tsvOut.defineColumn(0, cidx, cname);
00886       }
00887       int totalColumns = tsv.getColumnCount(0) + additionalHeadersCount;
00888       for ( ;cidx < totalColumns; cidx++ ) {
00889         cname = additionalHeaders[cidx - tsv.getColumnCount(0)];
00890         tsvOut.defineColumn(0, cidx, cname);
00891       }
00892       tsvOut.writeTsv_v1(strOutputFileName);
00893 
00894       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00895 
00896         std::string col;
00897         for ( cidx = 0; cidx < tsv.getColumnCount(0); cidx++ ) {
00898           tsv.get(0,cidx, col);
00899           tsvOut.set(0,cidx, col);
00900         }
00901         tsv.get(0,0, col);
00902         AffxString strExperimentName = col;
00903 
00904         for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++)  {
00905           CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00906           AffxString str1 = Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName());
00907           str1 = str1.toLowerCase();
00908           AffxString str2 = Fs::basename(strExperimentName);
00909           str2 = str2.toLowerCase();
00910           if (str1 == str2) {
00911             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00912             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian(), 6));
00913             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN(), 6));
00914             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getIqr(), 6));
00915             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle(), 6));
00916             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric(), 6));
00917             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianCnState(), 6));
00918             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianRawIntensity(), 6));
00919             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getCallRate(), 6));
00920             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getSNPQC(), 6));
00921             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getRawSNPQC(), 6));
00922             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getAntigenomicRatio(), 6));
00923             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSegCountTotal()));
00924             tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSd(), 6));
00925           }
00926         }
00927         tsvOut.writeLevel(0);
00928       }
00929       tsv.clear();
00930       tsvOut.close();
00931       tsvOut.clear();
00932     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00933   }
00934   else  {
00935     tsvOut.addHeader("version-to-report" , m_pEngine->getOpt("version-to-report"));
00936     tsvOut.addHeader("guid" , affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00937     const std::string headers[] = {
00938       "cel_files" , "Y-Gender" , "MedianAutosomeMedian" ,
00939       "MAPD" , "iqr" , "all_probeset_rle_mean" ,
00940       "gc-correction-size" , "sample-median-cn-state" , "median-raw-intensity" ,
00941       "call-rate", "SNPQC" , "RawSNPQC" , "AntigenomicRatio" , "waviness-seg-count" , "waviness-sd"
00942     };
00943     int headerCount = sizeof(headers) / sizeof(headers[0]);
00944     for ( int i = 0; i < headerCount; i++ ) {
00945       tsvOut.defineColumn(0,i,headers[i]);
00946     }
00947     tsvOut.writeTsv_v1(strOutputFileName);
00948 
00949     for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++)  {
00950       int cidx = 0;
00951       CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00952       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,Fs::basename(pobjExperiment->getExperimentName()));
00953       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00954       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian(), 6));
00955       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN(), 6));
00956       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getIqr(), 6));
00957       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle(), 6));
00958       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric(), 6));
00959       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianCnState(), 6));
00960       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianRawIntensity(), 6));
00961       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getCallRate(), 6));
00962       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getSNPQC(), 6));
00963       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getRawSNPQC(), 6));
00964       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getAntigenomicRatio(), 6));
00965       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getInt(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSegCountTotal()));
00966       tsvOut.set(0,cidx++,::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getWavinessSd(), 6));
00967       tsvOut.writeLevel(0);
00968     }
00969     tsvOut.close();
00970     tsvOut.clear();
00971   }
00972 }
00973 
00974 /**
00975  * Load the allele summary table file and set up the A Allele signal matrix and the B Allele signal matrix.
00976  * The data is load by Probe set meaning the all the experiment data is loaded for a subset of the probe sets.
00977  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
00978  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
00979  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
00980  * @return bool - true if successful
00981  */
00982 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadAlleleEstimatesByProbeSet(const AffxString& strFileName, int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
00983 {
00984     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return loadAlleleEstimatesByProbeSetHdf5(strFileName, iProbeSetIndex, iProbeSetsToProcess);}
00985     bool bSuccessful = false;
00986     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00987     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
00988     CNProbeSet objSearch;
00989     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00990     
00991     if (tsv.openTable(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00992       bSuccessful = true;
00993       std::string col;
00994       std::string columnHeader("probeset_id");
00995       while ( (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
00996               (tsv.get(0,0,col) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
00997               ( col != columnHeader) ) { }
00998                 
00999       if ( col == columnHeader ){
01000         unsigned int uiColCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01001         int iDotCount = 10;
01002         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Allele Estimates file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01003         int iRowIndex = 0;
01004         int iProbeSetsProcessed = 0;
01005         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK)    {
01006           int cidx = 0;
01007           Verbose::progressStep(1);
01008           std::string col;
01009           tsv.get(0, cidx++, col);
01010           AffxString strProbeSetName = col;
01011           if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-"))) {
01012             strProbeSetName = strProbeSetName.substring(0, (int)strProbeSetName.length() - 2);
01013           }
01014           bool bCn = ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("CN")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("chr")));
01015           objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01016           iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01017           if ((iRowIndex == -1) || ((iRowIndex >= iProbeSetIndex) && (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount)))){
01018             if (iRowIndex != -1) {iRowIndex -= iProbeSetIndex;}
01019             if (iRowIndex != -1) {
01020               for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)  {
01021                 if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input"))   {
01022                   tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
01023                   m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble())));
01024                 }
01025                 else {
01026                   m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
01027                 }
01028                 if (bCn) {m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get(uiColIndex, iRowIndex) / 2.0));}
01029               }
01030             }
01031             if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-"))) {
01032               if ( tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
01033                 if (iRowIndex != -1)  {
01034                   int cidx2 = 1;
01035                   for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++) {
01036                     tsv.get(0,cidx2++, col);
01037                     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input")) {
01038                       m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble())));
01039                     }
01040                     else {
01041                       m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
01042                     }
01043                   }
01044                 }
01045               }
01046             }
01047             else {
01048               if (iRowIndex != -1) {
01049                 for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)  {
01050                   m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get(uiColIndex, iRowIndex));
01051                 }
01052               }
01053             }
01054             if (iRowIndex != -1) {iProbeSetsProcessed++; if (iProbeSetsProcessed == iProbeSetsToProcess) {break;}}
01055           }
01056         }
01057         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01058       }
01059       tsv.clear();
01060     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01061     return bSuccessful;
01062 }
01063 
01064 /**
01065  * Load the allele summary table file and set up the A Allele signal matrix and the B Allele signal matrix.
01066  * The data is load by Probe set meaning the all the experiment data is loaded for a subset of the probe sets.
01067  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01068  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01069  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01070  * @return bool - true if successful
01071  */
01072 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadAlleleEstimatesByProbeSetHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName, int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01073 {
01074     bool bSuccessful = false;
01075     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01076     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01077     try
01078     {
01079         AffxString str;
01080         double d = 0;
01081         affx::File5_File file5;
01082         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01083         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01084         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01085         AffxString strAnalysisName = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
01086         if (strFileName == m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))
01087         {
01088             group5 = file5.openGroup(strAnalysisName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01089             tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".plier.summary", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01090         }
01091         else
01092         {
01093             tsv5 = file5.openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".plier.summary", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01094         }
01095         bSuccessful = true;
01096         unsigned int uiColCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01097         int iDotCount = 10;
01098         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Allele Estimates file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01099         int iRowIndex = 0;
01100         int iProbeSetsProcessed = 0;
01101         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01102         {
01103             Verbose::progressStep(1);
01104             AffxString strProbeSetName; tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
01105             if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-")))
01106             {
01107                 strProbeSetName = strProbeSetName.substring(0, (int)strProbeSetName.length() - 2);
01108             }
01109             bool bCn = ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("CN")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("chr")));
01110             objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01111             iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01112             if ((iRowIndex == -1) || ((iRowIndex >= iProbeSetIndex) && (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount))))
01113             {
01114                 if (iRowIndex != -1) {iRowIndex -= iProbeSetIndex;}
01115                 if (iRowIndex != -1)
01116                 {
01117                     for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)
01118                     {
01119                         tsv5->get(0, (uiColIndex + 1), &d);
01120                         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input"))
01121                         {
01122                             m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * d)));
01123                         }
01124                         else
01125                         {
01126                             m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)d);
01127                         }
01128                         if (bCn) {m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get(uiColIndex, iRowIndex) / 2.0));}
01129                     }
01130                 }
01131                 if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-")))
01132                 {
01133                     tsv5->nextLine();
01134                     if (iRowIndex != -1)
01135                     {
01136                         for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)
01137                         {
01138                             tsv5->get(0, (uiColIndex + 1), &d);
01139                             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input"))
01140                             {
01141                                 m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * d)));
01142                             }
01143                             else
01144                             {
01145                                 m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, (float)d);
01146                             }
01147                         }
01148                     }
01149                 }
01150                 else
01151                 {
01152                     if (iRowIndex != -1)
01153                     {
01154                         for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)
01155                         {
01156                             m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set(uiColIndex, iRowIndex, m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get(uiColIndex, iRowIndex));
01157                         }
01158                     }
01159                 }
01160                 if (iRowIndex != -1) {iProbeSetsProcessed++; if (iProbeSetsProcessed == iProbeSetsToProcess) {break;}}
01161             }
01162         }
01163         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01164         tsv5->close();
01165         delete tsv5;
01166         if (group5 != NULL)
01167         {
01168             group5->close();
01169             delete group5;
01170         }
01171         file5.close();
01172         bSuccessful = true;
01173     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01174     return bSuccessful;
01175 }

01177 /**
01178  * Load the allele summary table file and set up the A Allele signal matrix and the B Allele signal matrix.
01179  * The data is load by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is loaded for a subset of the experiments.
01180  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01181  * @param int - The experiment index to start from.
01182  * @param int - The number of exeriments to process each time this function is called.
01183  * @return bool - true if successful
01184  */
01185 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadAlleleEstimatesByExperiment(const AffxString& strFileName, int iExperimentIndex, int iExperimentsToProcess)
01186 {
01187     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return loadAlleleEstimatesByExperimentHdf5(strFileName, iExperimentIndex, iExperimentsToProcess);}
01188     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::loadAlleleEstimatesByExperiment");
01189     bool bSuccessful = false;
01190 
01191     affx::TsvFile tsv;
01192     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01193     int iRowIndex = -1;
01194     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01195     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
01196     
01197     if (tsv.openTable(strFileName) == affx::TSV_OK) {
01198       bSuccessful = true;
01199       std::string col;
01200       std::string columnHeader("probeset_id");
01201       while ( (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01202               (tsv.get(0,0,col) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01203               ( col != columnHeader) ) { }
01204                 
01205       if ( col == columnHeader ){
01206         bSuccessful = true;
01207         unsigned int uiColCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01208         getExperiments()->reserve(uiColCount);
01209         int iDotCount = 10;
01210         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Allele Estimates file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01211         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
01212           Verbose::progressStep(1);
01213           tsv.get(0,0, col);
01214           AffxString strProbeSetName = col;
01215           if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-"))) {
01216             strProbeSetName = strProbeSetName.substring(0, (int)strProbeSetName.length() - 2);
01217           }
01218           bool bCn = ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("CN")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("chr")));
01219           objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01220           iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01221           if (iRowIndex != -1) {
01222             for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++){
01223               tsv.get(0, iColIndex -1, col);
01224               if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input"))  {
01225                 m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble())));
01226               }
01227               else {
01228                 m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float) AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
01229               }
01230               if (bCn) {m_mxAAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float)(m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex) / 2.0));}
01231             }
01232           }
01233           if ((strProbeSetName.startsWith("SNP_A-")) || (strProbeSetName.startsWith("AFFX-SNP_A-")))  {
01234             if ( tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
01235               if (iRowIndex != -1) {
01236                 for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++){
01237                   tsv.get(0,iColIndex - 1, col);
01238                   if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("log2-input")) {
01239                     m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float)(exp(log(2.0) * AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble())));
01240                   }
01241                   else {
01242                     m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
01243                   }
01244                 }
01245               }
01246             }
01247           }
01248           else {
01249             if (iRowIndex != -1)  {
01250               for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++){
01251                 m_mxBAlleleEstimates.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex));
01252               }
01253             }
01254           }
01255         }
01256       }
01257       Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01258     } else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01259     tsv.clear();
01260     return bSuccessful;
01261 }

01268  * @return bool - true if successful
01269  */
01270 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadAlleleEstimatesByExperimentHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName, int iExperimentIndex, int iExperimentsToProcess)
01271 {

01371 
01372 /**
01373  * Load the genotype call table file and set up the genotype call matrix.
01374  * The data is load by Probe set meaning the all the experiment data is loaded for a subset of the probe sets.
01375  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01376  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01377  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01378  * @return bool - true if successful
01379  */
01380 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadGenotypeCallsByProbeSet(const AffxString& strFileName, int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01381 {
01382     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return loadGenotypeCallsByProbeSetHdf5(strFileName, iProbeSetIndex, iProbeSetsToProcess);}
01383     bool bSuccessful = false;
01384     affx::TsvFile tsv;
01385     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
01386     
01387     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01388     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01389     tsv.openTable(strFileName);
01390     std::string col;
01391     std::string columnHeader("probeset_id");
01392     while ( (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01393             (tsv.get(0,0,col) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01394             ( col != columnHeader) ) { }
01395     
01396     if ( col == columnHeader ){
01397       bSuccessful = true;
01398       unsigned int uiColCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01399       int cidx = 1;
01400       if ((int)uiColCount != getExperiments()->getCount()) {throw(Except("Genotype Calls table does not have the correct number of experiments."));}
01401       for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++)  {
01402         AffxString strExperimentName = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex)->getExperimentName();
01403         int iFindIndex = strExperimentName.indexOf(".");
01404         if (iFindIndex != -1) {strExperimentName = strExperimentName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01405         tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
01406         AffxString strColumnName = Fs::basename(col);
01407         iFindIndex = strColumnName.indexOf(".");
01408         if (iFindIndex != -1) {strColumnName = strColumnName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01409         if (strColumnName != strExperimentName) {throw(Except("Experiment name mismatch between Allele Summary table and Genotype Calls table: " + strExperimentName + " vs. " + strColumnName));}
01410       }
01411       for (int iRowIndex = iProbeSetIndex; (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount)); iRowIndex++)  {
01412         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++) {
01413           m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), (char)-1);
01414         }
01415       }
01416       int iDotCount = 10;
01417       Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Genotype Calls ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01418       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
01419         Verbose::progressStep(1);
01420         cidx = 0;
01421         tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
01422         AffxString strProbeSetName = col;
01423         objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01424         int iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01425         if ((iRowIndex == -1) || ((iRowIndex >= iProbeSetIndex) && (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount)))){
01426           if (iRowIndex != -1) {
01427             for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++) {
01428               tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
01429               m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(uiColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), (char)AffxByteArray(col).parseInt());
01430             }
01431           }
01432         }
01433       }
01434       Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01435     }
01436     tsv.clear();
01437     return bSuccessful;
01438 }
01439 
01440 /**
01441  * Load the genotype call table file and set up the genotype call matrix.
01442  * The data is load by Probe set meaning the all the experiment data is loaded for a subset of the probe sets.
01443  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01444  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01445  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01446  * @return bool - true if successful
01447  */
01448 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadGenotypeCallsByProbeSetHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName, int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01449 {
01450     bool bSuccessful = false;
01451     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01452     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01453     try
01454     {
01455         AffxString str;
01456         int i = 0;
01457         affx::File5_File file5;
01458         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01459         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01460         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01461         AffxString strAnalysisName = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
01462         if (strFileName == m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))
01463         {
01464             group5 = file5.openGroup(strAnalysisName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01465             tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".calls", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01466         }
01467         else
01468         {
01469             tsv5 = file5.openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".calls", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01470         }
01471         bSuccessful = true;
01472         unsigned int uiColCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01473         if ((int)uiColCount != getExperiments()->getCount()) {throw(Except("Genotype Calls table does not have the correct number of experiments."));}
01474         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++)
01475         {
01476             AffxString strExperimentName = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex)->getExperimentName();
01477             int iFindIndex = strExperimentName.indexOf(".");
01478             if (iFindIndex != -1) {strExperimentName = strExperimentName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01479             AffxString strColumnName = tsv5->getColumnPtr(0, iColIndex + 1)->getColumnName();
01480             iFindIndex = strColumnName.indexOf(".");
01481             if (iFindIndex != -1) {strColumnName = strColumnName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01482             if (strColumnName != strExperimentName) {throw(Except("Experiment name mismatch between Allele Summary table and Genotype Calls table: " + strExperimentName + " vs. " + strColumnName));}
01483         }
01484         for (int iRowIndex = iProbeSetIndex; (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount)); iRowIndex++)
01485         {
01486             for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++)
01487             {
01488                 m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), (char)-1);
01489             }
01490         }
01491         int iDotCount = 10;
01492         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Genotype Calls ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01493         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01494         {
01495             Verbose::progressStep(1);
01496             AffxString strProbeSetName; tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
01497             objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01498             int iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01499             if ((iRowIndex == -1) || ((iRowIndex >= iProbeSetIndex) && (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), (int)uiRowCount))))
01500             {
01501                 if (iRowIndex != -1)
01502                 {
01503                     for (unsigned int uiColIndex = 0; (uiColIndex < uiColCount); uiColIndex++)
01504                     {
01505                         tsv5->get(0, (uiColIndex + 1), &i);
01506                         m_mxGenotypeCalls.set(uiColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), (char)i);
01507                     }
01508                 }
01509             }
01510         }
01511         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01512         tsv5->close();
01513         delete tsv5;
01514         if (group5 != NULL)
01515         {
01516             group5->close();
01517             delete group5;
01518         }
01519         file5.close();
01520         bSuccessful = true;
01521     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
01522     return bSuccessful;
01523 }

01525 /**
01526  * Load the genotype call table file and set up the genotype call matrix.
01527  * The data is load by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is loaded for a subset of the experiments.
01528  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01529  * @param int - The experiment index to start from.
01530  * @param int - The number of exeriments to process each time this function is called.
01531  * @return bool - true if successful
01532  */
01533 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadGenotypeCallsByExperiment(const AffxString& strFileName, int iExperimentIndex, int iExperimentsToProcess)
01534 {
01535     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {return loadGenotypeCallsByExperimentHdf5(strFileName, iExperimentIndex, iExperimentsToProcess);}
01536     bool bSuccessful = false;
01537     affx::TsvFile tsv;
01538     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
01539     
01540     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01541     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01542     std::string col;
01543     
01544     tsv.openTable(strFileName);
01545     bSuccessful = true;
01546     std::string columnHeader("probeset_id");
01547     while ( (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01548             (tsv.get(0,0,col) == affx::TSV_OK) &&
01549             ( col != columnHeader) ) { }
01550     
01551     if ( col == columnHeader ){
01552       unsigned int uiColCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01553       int cidx = 1;
01554       if ((int)uiColCount != getExperiments()->getCount()) {throw(Except("Genotype Calls table does not have the correct number of experiments."));}
01555       for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++)  {
01556         AffxString strExperimentName = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex)->getExperimentName();
01557         int iFindIndex = strExperimentName.indexOf(".");
01558         if (iFindIndex != -1) {strExperimentName = strExperimentName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01559         tsv.get(0,cidx++, col);
01560         AffxString strColumnName = Fs::basename(col);
01561         iFindIndex = strColumnName.indexOf(".");
01562         if (iFindIndex != -1) {strColumnName = strColumnName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01563         if (strColumnName != strExperimentName) {throw(Except("Experiment name mismatch between Allele Summary table and Genotype Calls table: " + strExperimentName + " vs. " + strColumnName));}
01564       }
01565       for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < (int)uiRowCount); iRowIndex++) {
01566         for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++) {
01567           m_mxGenotypeCalls.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (char)-1);
01568         }
01569       }
01570       int iDotCount = 10;
01571       Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Genotype Calls ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01572       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
01573         Verbose::progressStep(1);
01574         int cidx = 0;
01575         tsv.get(0, cidx++, col);
01576         AffxString strProbeSetName = col;
01577         objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01578         int iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01579         if (iRowIndex != -1){
01580           for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++)  {
01581             tsv.get(0,iColIndex - 1, col);
01582             m_mxGenotypeCalls.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (char)AffxByteArray(col).parseInt());
01583           }
01584         }
01585       }
01586       Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
01587     }
01588     tsv.clear();
01589     return bSuccessful;
01590 }

01735 /**
01736  * Load the genotype confidence table file and set up the genotype confidence matrix.
01737  * The data is load by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is loaded for a subset of the experiments.
01738  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the file to load.
01739  * @param int - The experiment index to start from.
01740  * @param int - The number of exeriments to process each time this function is called.
01741  * @return bool - true if successful
01742  */
01743 bool CNLog2RatioData::loadGenotypeConfidencesByExperimentHdf5(const AffxString& strFileName, int iExperimentIndex, int iExperimentsToProcess)
01744 {
01745     bool bSuccessful = false;
01746     unsigned int uiRowCount = m_arProbeSets.getCount();
01747     CNProbeSet objSearch;
01748     try
01749     {
01750         AffxString str;
01751         double d = 0;
01752         affx::File5_File file5;
01753         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
01754         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01755         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01756         AffxString strAnalysisName = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
01757         if (strFileName == m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))
01758         {
01759             group5 = file5.openGroup(strAnalysisName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01760             tsv5 = group5->openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".confidences", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01761         }
01762         else
01763         {
01764             tsv5 = file5.openTsv(strAnalysisName + ".confidences", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01765         }
01766         bSuccessful = true;
01767         unsigned int uiColCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0) - 1;
01768         if ((int)uiColCount != getExperiments()->getCount()) {throw(Except("Genotype Confidences table does not have the correct number of experiments."));}
01769         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < (int)uiColCount); iColIndex++)
01770         {
01771             AffxString strExperimentName = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex)->getExperimentName();
01772             int iFindIndex = strExperimentName.indexOf(".");
01773             if (iFindIndex != -1) {strExperimentName = strExperimentName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}

01776             if (iFindIndex != -1) {strColumnName = strColumnName.substring(0, iFindIndex);}
01777             if (strColumnName != strExperimentName) {throw(Except("Experiment name mismatch between Allele Summary table and Genotype Confidences table: " + strExperimentName + " vs. " + strColumnName));}
01778         }
01779         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < (int)uiRowCount); iRowIndex++)
01780         {
01781             for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++)
01782             {
01783                 m_mxGenotypeConfidences.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, 0);
01784             }
01785         }
01786         int iDotCount = 10;
01787         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Loading Genotype Confidences ", iDotCount, Max((int)(uiRowCount / iDotCount), 1), uiRowCount);
01788         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
01789         {
01790             Verbose::progressStep(1);
01791             AffxString strProbeSetName; tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
01792             objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
01793             int iRowIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
01794             if (iRowIndex != -1)
01795             {
01796                 for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + iExperimentsToProcess), (int)uiColCount)); iColIndex++)
01797                 {
01798                     tsv5->get(0, (iColIndex + 1), &d);
01799                     m_mxGenotypeConfidences.set((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex, (float)d);
01800                 }
01801             }
