01816 
01817 /**
01818  * Calculate the median singal for the log2 ratio model.
01819  * The data is processed by probes set meaning the all the experiment data is processed for a subset of the probe sets.
01820  * Note that the median signal is A + B.
01821  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01822  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01823  */
01824 void CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianSignal(int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01825 {
01826     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianSignal");
01827     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vSignals(getExperiments()->getCount());
01828     for (int iRowIndex = iProbeSetIndex; (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), m_arProbeSets.getCount())); iRowIndex++)
01829     {
01830         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
01831         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iColIndex++)
01832         {
01833             vSignals.set(iColIndex, (float)getSnpSignalEstimate(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), pobjProbeSet));
01834         }
01835         pobjProbeSet->setMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vSignals.median(), 10));
01836     }
01837 }
01838 
01839 /**
01840  * Calculate the median singals for the log2 ratio model.
01841  * The data is processed by probes set meaning the all the experiment data is processed for a subset of the probe sets.
01842  * Note that the median signals broken out by genotype is A - B.
01843  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01844  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01845  */
01846 void CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianSignalsPerGenotype(int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01847 {
01848     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianSignalsPerGenotype");
01849     int iExperimentCount = getExperiments()->getCount();
01850     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vAASignals(iExperimentCount);
01851     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vABSignals(iExperimentCount);
01852     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vBBSignals(iExperimentCount);
01853     for (int iRowIndex = iProbeSetIndex; (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), m_arProbeSets.getCount())); iRowIndex++)
01854     {
01855         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
01856         int iAAIndex = 0;
01857         int iABIndex = 0;
01858         int iBBIndex = 0;
01859         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iColIndex++)
01860         {
01861             CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex);
01862             if ((pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() != m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome")) || (pobjExperiment->hasXX()))
01863             {
01864                 float fAllelicDifference = (float)getAllelicDifference(iColIndex, 0, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex));
01865                 switch (m_mxGenotypeCalls.get(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex)))
01866                 {
01867                 case 0: vAASignals.set(iAAIndex, fAllelicDifference); iAAIndex++; break;
01868                 case 1: vABSignals.set(iABIndex, fAllelicDifference); iABIndex++; break;
01869                 case 2: vBBSignals.set(iBBIndex, fAllelicDifference); iBBIndex++; break;
01870                 }
01871             }
01872         }
01873         pobjProbeSet->setAAMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vAASignals.median(iAAIndex), 10));
01874         pobjProbeSet->setABMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vABSignals.median(iABIndex), 10));
01875         pobjProbeSet->setBBMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vBBSignals.median(iBBIndex), 10));
01876     }
01877 }
01878 
01879 /**
01880  * Calculate the median singals for the log2 ratio model.
01881  * The data is processed by probes set meaning the all the experiment data is processed for a subset of the probe sets.
01882  * Note that the median signal is A + B. The hasXX and hasY is set in the calculateXY function.
01883  * @param int - The probe set index to start from.
01884  * @param int - The number of probe sets to process each time this function is called.
01885  */
01886 void CNLog2RatioData::calculateXYMedianSignal(int iProbeSetIndex, int iProbeSetsToProcess)
01887 {
01888     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateXYMedianSignal");
01889     int iXXCount = 0;
01890     int iYCount = 0;
01891     for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iColIndex++)
01892     {
01893         CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex);
01894         if (pobjExperiment->hasXX()) {iXXCount++;}
01895         if (pobjExperiment->hasY()) {iYCount++;}
01896     }
01897     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vXX(iXXCount);
01898     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vY(iYCount);
01899     for (int iRowIndex = iProbeSetIndex; (iRowIndex < Min((iProbeSetIndex + iProbeSetsToProcess), m_arProbeSets.getCount())); iRowIndex++)
01900     {
01901         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
01902         int iXXIndex = 0;
01903         int iYIndex = 0;
01904         for (int iColIndex = 0; (iColIndex < getExperiments()->getCount()); iColIndex++)
01905         {
01906             CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex);
01907             if (pobjExperiment->hasXX())
01908             {
01909                 vXX.set(iXXIndex, (float)getSnpSignalEstimate(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), pobjProbeSet));
01910                 iXXIndex++;
01911             }
01912             if (pobjExperiment->hasY())
01913             {
01914                 vY.set(iYIndex, (float)getSnpSignalEstimate(iColIndex, (iRowIndex - iProbeSetIndex), pobjProbeSet));
01915                 iYIndex++;
01916             }
01917         }
01918         // The values are rounded here to insure that the values stored in the model will match the values as caluclated using the same inputs.
01919         pobjProbeSet->setXXMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vXX.median(), 10));
01920         pobjProbeSet->setYMedianSignal((float)::roundDouble(vY.median(), 10));
01921     }
01922 }
01923 
01924 /**
01925  * Write the model file in text format. All the median signals asssociated with the probe sets are written out.
01926  * Values are rounded to insure that the stored values will match the calculated values when using the same input.
01927  * @param const AffxString& - The file name to write to.
01928  * @return bool - true if successful
01929  */
01930 bool CNLog2RatioData::writeModelFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
01931 {
01932     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::writeModelFile");
01933     if ( !Fs::dirExists(Fs::dirname(strFileName)) ) {
01934       Fs::mkdirPath(Fs::dirname(strFileName), false);
01935     }
01936     bool bSuccessful = false;
01937     affx::TsvFile tsvOut;
01938     
01939     AffxByteArray baLine;
01940     int iDotCount = 10;
01941     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("reference-text-output") && m_pEngine->getOptBool("reference-text-output"))  {
01942       // write out the options used.
01943       tsvOut.addHeader("guid" ,  affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
01944 
01945       // dump options.
01946       tsvOut.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-celFileCount", m_pEngine->getOpt("sample-count"));
01947       tsvOut.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-analysis-name" , m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
01948       tsvOut.addHeader( "affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-adapter-normalization" ,
01949                         (m_pEngine->getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization") ? "true" : "false"));
01950 
01951       // dump options
01952       vector<string> optionNames;
01953       m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
01954       for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
01955         std::string name = optionNames[i];
01956         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
01957         if (vals.size() > 1)   {
01958           for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++) {
01959             std::string val = vals[j];
01960             tsvOut.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name,  val);
01961           }
01962         }
01963         else {
01964           std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
01965           //aw: hack because old versions of the code use "opt-set-analysis-name" instead of "state-analysis-name" to load the global prefix
01966           if(name == "set-analysis-name") { val = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name"); }
01967           tsvOut.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name , val);
01968         }
01969       }
01970       // dump state.
01971       std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
01972       m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
01973       for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
01974         std::string name = stateNames[i];
01975         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
01976         if (vals.size() > 1) {
01977           for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++) {
01978             std::string val = vals[j];
01979             tsvOut.addHeader(std::string("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-") + name ,  val);
01980           }
01981         }
01982         else {
01983           std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
01984           tsvOut.addHeader(std::string("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-") + name , val);
01985         }
01986       }
01987 
01988       // write out the reference data.
01989       const std::string headers[] = {
01990         "probeset_id" , "MedianSignal" , "XXMedianSignal" , "YMedianSignal" ,
01991         "AAMedianSignal" , "ABMedianSignal" , "BBMedianSignal"
01992       };
01993       int headersCount = sizeof( headers ) / sizeof( headers[0] );
01994       for ( int i = 0; i < headersCount ; i++ ) {
01995         tsvOut.defineColumn(0, i, headers[i]);
01996       }
01997       tsvOut.writeTsv_v1(strFileName);
01998       
01999       Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Writing Model file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(m_arProbeSets.getCount() / iDotCount), 1), m_arProbeSets.getCount());
02000       for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); iRowIndex++)  {
02001         Verbose::progressStep(1);
02002         int cidx = 0;
02003         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
02004         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
02005         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal(), 10));
02006         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getXXMedianSignal(), 10));
02007         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getYMedianSignal(), 10));
02008         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getAAMedianSignal(), 10));
02009         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getABMedianSignal(), 10));
02010         tsvOut.set(0, cidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getBBMedianSignal(), 10));
02011         tsvOut.writeLevel(0);
02012       }
02013       Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
02014       tsvOut.close();
02015       tsvOut.clear();
02016       bSuccessful = true;
02017     }
02018     else
02019     {
02020         try
02021         {
02022             AffxString str;
02023             affx::File5_File file5;
02024             bool bFileExists = Fs::fileExists(strFileName);
02025             
02026       // @todo I think this could be "affx::FILE5_OPEN||affx::FILE5_CREATE" -jhg
02027             file5.open(strFileName, (bFileExists ? affx::FILE5_OPEN : affx::FILE5_CREATE));
02028             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02029             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02030             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
02031             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%guid=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid()); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02032 
02033             // dump options.
02034             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-celFileCount=" + m_pEngine->getOpt("sample-count")); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02035             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-analysis-name=" + m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name")); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02036             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, std::string() + "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-adapter-normalization=" + (m_pEngine->getOptBool("adapter-type-normalization") ? "true" : "false")); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02037 
02038             // dump options
02039             vector<string> optionNames;
02040             m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
02041             for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
02042                 std::string name = optionNames[i];
02043                 std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
02044                 if (vals.size() > 1)
02045                 {
02046                     for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
02047                     {
02048                         std::string val = vals[j];
02049                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02050                     }
02051                 }
02052                 else
02053                 {
02054                     std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
02055                     //aw: hack because old versions of the code use "opt-set-analysis-name" instead of "state-analysis-name" to load the global prefix
02056                     if(name == "set-analysis-name") { val = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name"); }
02057                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-opt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02058                 }
02059             }
02060             // dump state.
02061             std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
02062             m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
02063             for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
02064                 std::string name = stateNames[i];
02065                 std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
02066                 if (vals.size() > 1)
02067                 {
02068                     for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
02069                     {
02070                         std::string val = vals[j];
02071                         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02072                     }
02073                 }
02074                 else
02075                 {
02076                     std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
02077                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02078                 }
02079             }
02080 
02081             tsv5->close();
02082             delete tsv5;
02083 
02084             int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
02085             for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02086             {
02087                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
02088                 iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
02089             }
02090             Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Writing Model file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(m_arProbeSets.getCount() / iDotCount), 1), m_arProbeSets.getCount());
02091             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Reference", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02092             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, iMaxProbeSetNameLength);
02093             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "MedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02094             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "XXMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02095             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "YMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02096             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "AAMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02097             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "ABMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02098             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 6, "BBMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
02099             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 7, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
02100             tsv5->defineColumn(0, 8, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
02101             for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02102             {
02103                 Verbose::progressStep(1);
02104                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
02105                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
02106                 tsv5->set_d(0, 1, pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
02107                 tsv5->set_d(0, 2, pobjProbeSet->getXXMedianSignal());
02108                 tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjProbeSet->getYMedianSignal());
02109                 tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjProbeSet->getAAMedianSignal());
02110                 tsv5->set_d(0, 5, pobjProbeSet->getABMedianSignal());
02111                 tsv5->set_d(0, 6, pobjProbeSet->getBBMedianSignal());
02112                 tsv5->set_i(0, 7, pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
02113                 tsv5->set_i(0, 8, pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
02114                 tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02115             }
02116             Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
02117             tsv5->close();
02118             delete tsv5;
02119             group5->close();
02120             delete group5;
02121             file5.close();
02122             bSuccessful = true;
02123         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
02124     }
02125     return bSuccessful;
02126 }

02143     {
02144         AffxString str;
02145         affx::File5_File file5;

02147

02150         affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02151         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Parameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02152         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
02153         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%guid=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid()); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02154

02159             std::string name = optionNames[i];
02160             std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
02161             if (vals.size() > 1)
02162             {

02166                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02167                 }
02168             }
02169             else
02170             {
02171                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
02172                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02173             }
02174         }
02175         // dump state.
02176         std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
02177         m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
02178         for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
02179             std::string name = stateNames[i];
02180             std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
02181             if (vals.size() > 1)
02182             {
02183                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
02184                 {
02185                     std::string val = vals[j];
02186                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02187                 }
02188             }
02189             else
02190             {
02191                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
02192                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02193             }
02194         }
02195 
02196         tsv5->close();
02197         delete tsv5;
02198 
02199         int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
02200         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02201         {
02202             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
02203             iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
02204         }
02205         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Writing Model file ", iDotCount, Max((int)(m_arProbeSets.getCount() / iDotCount), 1), m_arProbeSets.getCount());
02206         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("MedianSignals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
02207         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, iMaxProbeSetNameLength);
02208         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "MedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02209         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "XXMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02210         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "YMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02211         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "AAMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02212         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "ABMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02213         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 6, "BBMedianSignal", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
02214         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 7, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
02215         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 8, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
02216         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); iRowIndex++)
02217         {
02218             Verbose::progressStep(1);
02219             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iRowIndex);
02220             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
02221             tsv5->set_d(0, 1, pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
02222             tsv5->set_d(0, 2, pobjProbeSet->getXXMedianSignal());
02223             tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjProbeSet->getYMedianSignal());
02224             tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjProbeSet->getAAMedianSignal());
02225             tsv5->set_d(0, 5, pobjProbeSet->getABMedianSignal());
02226             tsv5->set_d(0, 6, pobjProbeSet->getBBMedianSignal());
02227             tsv5->set_i(0, 7, pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
02228             tsv5->set_i(0, 8, pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
02229             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
02230         }
02231         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
02232         tsv5->close();
02233         delete tsv5;
02234         group5->close();
02235         delete group5;
02236         file5.close();
02237     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
02238 }
02239 
02240 /**
02241  * @brief Return the signal estimate for the SNP
02242  * @param int - The column index
02243  * @param int - The row idex
02244  * @return double - The signal estimate for the SNP
02245  */
02246 double CNLog2RatioData::getSnpSignalEstimate(int iColIndex, int iRowIndex, CNProbeSet* p)
02247 {
02248     double d = (m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get(iColIndex, iRowIndex) + m_mxBAlleleEstimates.get(iColIndex, iRowIndex));
02249     if (d == 0) {Err::errAbort("Zero SNP signal estimate found. CEL file may be truncated.\t" + p->getProbeSetName());}
02250     if (d != d) {Err::errAbort("NaN SNP signal estimate found. CEL file may be truncated.");}
02251     if (!Util::isFinite(d)) {Err::errAbort("Non finite SNP signal estimate found. CEL file may be truncated.");}
02252     return d;
02253 }
02254 
02255 /**
02256  * @brief Return the allelic difference for the SNP
02257  * @param int - The column index
02258  * @param int - The experiment index
02259  * @param int - The row idex
02260  * @return double - The allelic difference for the SNP
02261  */
02262 double CNLog2RatioData::getAllelicDifference(int iColIndex, int iExperimentIndex, int iRowIndex)
02263 {
02264     double d = (m_mxAAlleleEstimates.get((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex) - m_mxBAlleleEstimates.get((iColIndex - iExperimentIndex), iRowIndex));
02265     if (!Util::isFinite(d)) {d = 0.0;}
02266     return d;
02267 }
02268 
02269 void CNLog2RatioData::loadProbeSets()
02270 {
02271     AffxArray<AffxString> arRestrictList;
02272     bool bRestrictList = (m_pEngine->getOpt("probeset-ids") != "");
02273     if (bRestrictList)
02274     {
02275         loadProbeSetNamesFromRestrictList(arRestrictList);
02276     }
02277     AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
02278     affx::File5_File file5;
02279     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
02280     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
02281 
02282     file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
02283     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
02284     {
02285         group5 = file5.openGroup("Cyto2", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02286         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("MedianSignals", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02287     }
02288     else
02289     {
02290         group5 = file5.openGroup("CopyNumber", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02291         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Reference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02292     }
02293     unsigned int uiCount = 0;
02294     AffxString str;
02295     int iSearchIndex = -1;
02296     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
02297     {
02298         uiCount++;
02299     }
02300     tsv5->close();
02301     delete tsv5;
02302 
02303     m_arProbeSets.nullAll();
02304     m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.nullAll();
02305     m_vProbeSets.clear();
02306     m_vProbeSets.allocate(uiCount);
02307     m_arProbeSets.reserve(uiCount);
02308 
02309     int iInputValue=0;
02310     double d = 0;
02311     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")))
02312     {
02313         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("MedianSignals", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02314     }
02315     else
02316     {
02317         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Reference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02318     }
02319     unsigned int uiIndex = 0;
02320     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
02321     {
02322         CNProbeSet *pset = m_vProbeSets.getAt(uiIndex);
02323         tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
02324         if (bRestrictList)
02325         {
02326             iSearchIndex = arRestrictList.binarySearch(str, 0);
02327             if (iSearchIndex == -1) {pset->setProcess(false);}
02328         }
02329         pset->setProbeSetName(str);
02330         tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); pset->setMedianSignal(d);
02331         tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); pset->setXXMedianSignal(d);
02332         tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); pset->setYMedianSignal(d);
02333         tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); pset->setAAMedianSignal(d);
02334         tsv5->get(0, 5, &d); pset->setABMedianSignal(d);
02335         tsv5->get(0, 6, &d); pset->setBBMedianSignal(d);
02336         tsv5->get(0, 7, &iInputValue); pset->setChromosome(iInputValue);
02337         m_arProbeSets.add(pset);
02338         m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.add(pset);
02339         uiIndex++;
02340     }
02341     tsv5->close();
02342     delete tsv5;
02343 
02344     group5->close();
02345     delete group5;
02346     file5.close();
02347 
02348     m_arProbeSets.quickSort(0); // By ProbeSetName
02349     m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.quickSort(1); // By Chromosome, Position
02350 
02351     // Warn if requested probe set not found.
02352     CNProbeSet objSearch;
02353     if (arRestrictList.getCount() > 0)
02354     {
02355         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < arRestrictList.getCount()); iIndex++)
02356         {
02357             AffxString str = *arRestrictList.getAt(iIndex);
02358             objSearch.setProbeSetName(str);
02359             int iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
02360             if (iSearchIndex  == -1)
02361             {
02362                 Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: ProbeSet specified in probeset-ids file will not appear in output data. ProbeSet: " + str);
02363             }
02364         }
02365     }
02366     arRestrictList.deleteAll();
02367 }
02368 
02369 void CNLog2RatioData::loadAnnotation(bool bNewProbeSets)
02370 {
02371     if (bNewProbeSets)
02372     {
02373         m_arProbeSets.nullAll();
02374         m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.nullAll();
02375     }
02376     else {loadProbeSets();}
02377 
02378     Annotation().loadAnnotationForCopynumber(*m_pEngine, bNewProbeSets, m_vProbeSets, m_arProbeSets);
02379 
02380     if (bNewProbeSets)
02381     {
02382         m_arProbeSets.reserve(m_vProbeSets.size());
02383         m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.reserve(m_vProbeSets.size());
02384         for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_vProbeSets.size()); iIndex++)
02385         {
02386             CNProbeSet *pset = m_vProbeSets.getAt(iIndex);
02387             if (pset->getChromosome() != 0)
02388             {
02389                 m_arProbeSets.add(pset);
02390                 m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.add(pset);
02391             }
02392         }
02393         m_arProbeSets.quickSort(0);
02394         m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.quickSort(0);
02395 
02396         readCovariatesFile();
02397 
02398         for (int i = 1; (i < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); i++)
02399         {
02400             CNProbeSet* pPrev = m_arProbeSets.getAt(i - 1);
02401             CNProbeSet* pNext = m_arProbeSets.getAt(i);
02402             if (pPrev->getProbeSetName() == pNext->getProbeSetName())
02403             {
02404                 Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Duplicate probe set exists in annotation-file. The duplicate is being removed: " + pPrev->getProbeSetName());
02405                 m_arProbeSets.removeAt(i);
02406                 m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.removeAt(i);
02407                 i--;
02408             }
02409         }
02410         m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort.quickSort(1);
02411     }
02412     for (int i = 0; (i < m_arProbeSets.getCount()); i++)
02413     {
02414         CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(i);
02415         if ((p->getChromosome() == 0) || (p->getPosition() == 0))
02416         {
02417             p->setChromosome(255);
02418             p->setPosition(0);
02419             p->setGCContent(0);
02420             p->setReplicateCount(1);
02421             p->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(false);
02422             p->setStyAdapterCode(false);
02423             p->setNspAdapterCode(false);
02424         }
02425     }
02426     overrideGcContent();
02427 
02428    // NOTE: The set up of the GC correction bins was moved to the CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio module to allow
02429    // a subset of probe sets to be binned rather than the complete set as was original done at this location.
02430 
02431     Verbose::out(1, ::getInt(m_arProbeSets.getCount()) + "\tProbeSets to process.");
02432 }
02433 
02434 void CNLog2RatioData::overrideGcContent()
02435 {
02436   if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("gc-content-override-file")) {return;}
02437   AffxString strGcContentOverrideFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("gc-content-override-file");
02438   if (strGcContentOverrideFileName != "")  {
02439     CNProbeSet objSearch;
02440     affx::TsvFile tsv;
02441     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
02442     std::string col;
02443 
02444     if (tsv.open(strGcContentOverrideFileName) == affx::TSV_OK)  {
02445       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK)  {
02446         int cidx = 0;
02447         tsv.get(0, cidx++, col);
02448         AffxString strProbeSetName = col;
02449         objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
02450         int iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
02451         if (iSearchIndex != -1) {
02452           tsv.get(0, cidx++, col);
02453           CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
02454           p->setGCContent((float)AffxByteArray(col).parseDouble());
02455         }
02456       }
02457       tsv.clear();
02458     }
02459     else {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strGcContentOverrideFileName));}
02460   }
02461 }
02462 
02463 // This method is located in CNLog2RatioData because at this point we have a sorted
02464 // CNProbeSetArray (m_arProbeSets) which is needed in order to do binarySearches based on probe set name
02465 void CNLog2RatioData::readCovariatesFile()
02466 {
02467     // Both annotation-file and covariate-file are required for reading the covariate-file to make any sense.
02468     if ((!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("annotation-file")) || (m_pEngine->getOpt("annotation-file") == "")) {return ;}
02469     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("covariates-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("covariates-file") != ""))
02470     {
02471         // Ensure that space has been allocated for the covariates.
02472         if (m_arProbeSets.size() > 0 && m_arProbeSets[0]->getNumCovariates() == 0)
02473         {
02474             Verbose::warn(1, "covariates-file option is ignored. annotation-file does not support covariates.");
02475             return;
02476         }
02477 
02478         try
02479         {
02480             // Open and read the file.
02481             affx::File5_File file5;
02482             file5.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("covariates-file"), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
02483             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("Covariates", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02484             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Covariate-Values", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
02485 
02486             // Filter the names of covariates to those that we would expect to find in the covariates file (as opposed to the annotation db file).
02487             vector<pair<int,int> > columnIdxToCovariateIdx;
02488             for (map<string, int>::iterator ii = CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.begin(); ii != CovariateParams::m_allCovariateMap.end(); ++ii)
02489             {
02490                 if (CovariateParams::isReservedCovariateName(ii->first) == false)
02491                 {
02492                     // Build a vector of indexes (column index in the file, covariate index in the array).
02493                     int colIdx = tsv5->getColumnIdx(0, ii->first);
02494                     if (colIdx < 0) Err::errAbort("Covariate [" + ii->first + "] missing from file - " + m_pEngine->getOpt("covariates-file"));
02495 
02496                     columnIdxToCovariateIdx.push_back(make_pair(colIdx, CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex(ii->first)));
02497                 }
02498             }
02499 
02500             // For each row in the file.
02501                 // Find matching probe set.
02502                 // Loop through all unreserved column and assign covariates.
02503             int iSearchIndex = -1;
02504             CNProbeSet objSearch;
02505             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
02506             {
02507                 AffxString strProbeSetName;
02508                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &strProbeSetName);
02509                 objSearch.setProbeSetName(strProbeSetName);
02510                 iSearchIndex = m_arProbeSets.binarySearch(objSearch, 0);
02511                 if (iSearchIndex != -1)
02512                 {
02513                     CNProbeSet* p = m_arProbeSets.getAt(iSearchIndex);
02514                     for (vector<pair<int,int> >::iterator ii = columnIdxToCovariateIdx.begin(); ii != columnIdxToCovariateIdx.end(); ++ii)
02515                     {
02516                         float d;
02517                         tsv5->get(0, ii->first, &d);
02518                         p->setCovariateValue(ii->second, (float)d);
02519                     }
02520                 }
02521             }
02522             tsv5->close();
02523             delete tsv5;
02524             group5->close();
02525             delete group5;
02526             file5.close();
02527         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + m_pEngine->getOpt("covariates-file")));}
02528     }
02529 }
